feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for New Zealand issued by MetService

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may exceed warning criteria in localised areas. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed coastal places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
